title: Show "Description" in the host list
author: av2k
body_snippet:
Show "Description" text in the host list

## Expected Behavior
The Description text should (optionally) show up in the host list next to or below the host name. 

## Current Behavior
The host list pane doesn't show the description.

## Possible Solution
Show the Description text, either in full or the first X letters, in the host list pane. See the attached image, proposed display in red.
